entry.title: The Carry-On Roller in Grey
entry.summary:
Vendor: Beach House Group
Type: Luggage
Price: 198.00

Description

The security line is a breeze with our carry-on-friendly roller, 360* smooth-rolling wheels make getting where you're going absolutely effortless. A trolley handle with a cushioned, silicone grip to ensure your hand never feels the stress of travel and an interior that expands an extra two inches, so wherever you go, you can bring a little something back (even if it is just a tan)! Béis Limited Lifetime Luggage Warranty included.
Specifications

Dims: 14"W x 9"D x 22"H
Material: Polycarbonate PVC Polyester Nylon Zipper Hardware
Care: Spot Clean
Weight: 8.36lbs
Details

EXTERIOR
durable hard sided 100% virgin PolyCarbonate (virgin materials guarantee a higher durability)
gradient 3D stripe design
Hinomoto 360 degree wheels
extendable BÉIS logo-ed ( lengths ) (contrast on black) trolley handle with soft hand cushion for comfort
BÉIS logo retractable bag attach strap - HOLDS UP TO 15LBS
BÉIS embossed logo
top carry handle
side carry handle with weight limit indicator
TSA locks  For instructions see here.
expandable (expands to 12" ) with zipper puller that indicates which zipper expands the luggage
water resistant zipper tape
capacity 40LBS. **we recommend that you adhere to airlines guidelines, please check with your airline for weight limit restrictions

INTERIOR
butterfly opening (for easy packing/unpacking)
lined with durable, easy to spot clean, 75D (polyester) with soft brushed hand feel
U-zip flap, with contrast faux leather trim, includes one zip pocket & one frosted PVC zip pocket
detachable, compression flap with U-zip pocket and mesh packet
four point compression straps
zip pouch for keeping small valuables
separate pouch set for dirty clothes, shoes, under garments, damp clothing

PERFECT FOR
Travel
Air Travel
Carry on

entry.title: The Work Tote in Cognac Croc
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type: The Work Tote
Price: 128.00

Description

OOO?!? No worries, you'll never be too far from paradise or your email with this on-the-go mobile office in a tote bag, bag! We designed this bag (selfishly) because there was not one good-looking bag on the market that we felt just as good carrying to work, to after work cocktails and to all of our out-of-office adventures. This chic tote packs in ALL the function, no detail was left out!
Specifications

Dims: 16.75"W x 13.5"H x 7"D Materials: Exterior - Croc Embossed Vegan Leather

Laptop Sleeve: 13.5"W x 11"H

Lining - 100% Polyester Hardware - Zinc Alloy

Care: Spot Clean

Weight: 2.86lbs
Details

EXTERIOR
Flat shoulder straps & removable, adjustable poly shoulder strap
Full zip closure
Trolley pass through with zipper, to create pocket when not in use and extra zip pocket on top
1 exterior slip pocket, 1 exterior zip pocket
INTERIOR
Removable interior zip pouch
Padded laptop sleeve pocket with Velcro strap closure 13.5"W x 11"H
Large zip pocket
Two small slip pockets & pen slips
Key-ring leash with dog clip to attach keys for quick access
PERFECT FOR
Everyday
Work Days
Weekends
Carry-On

entry.title: E-Gift Card
entry.summary:
Vendor: Rise.ai
Type:
Price: 25.00 - 500.00 (7 variants)

Shopping for someone else but not sure what to give them? Give them the gift of choice with a gift card.
Gift cards are delivered by email and contain instructions to redeem them at checkout. Our gift cards have no additional processing fees.

entry.title: The Backpack Diaper Bag
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type: Diaper Bag
Price: 138.00

Description

The anti-diaper diaper bag backpack is the perfect accessory with enough function to tote around all your baby-mama needs and chic enough that NO ONE will ever suspect that you're carrying around a week-old dirty diaper! Complete with every essential needed for that dreaded diaper change; a changing pad with a diaper and baby wipes pocket, an odor-proof pouch, a teething ring to keep the babe from squirming, and a pacifier pouch to easily reach that must-have baby plug! These diaper bag backpacks are the ultimate lifesaver for any busy mom that's always on the go.
Specifications

Dims: 12" W x 15" H x 7.75" D
Materials:
Body: Nylon Twill
Trim: Buffalo PU,
Jelly PVC (Accessories)
Silicone (Teething Ring)
Lining: 100% Poly
Zinc Alloy Hardware
Care: Spot Clean
Weight: 4lbs
Details

EXTERIOR
- 5 Exterior pockets(2 slips, 2 slips with magnetic closure, 1 zip) (one pocket to hold changing pad)
- Trolley sleeve with option to use as a zip pocket
- Removable/Interchangeable padded shoulder strap
- Removable/Interchangeable padded chain strap
- Removable/Interchangeable adjustable strap with shoulder pad
- Breakaway zipper for easy access to interior
- Snaps on sides to reduce/expand size
- Metal feet on bottom to protect from wear & tear
INTERIOR
- Removable stroller straps
- Tabs for stroller caddy (sold separately)
- Key Fob
- Pacifier pouch included
- Odor Proof bag (for dirty diapers/clothing)
- Portable changing pad with slip pocket for diapers & wipes
- Teething ring
- Insulated drawstring pocket for bottles
- Padded Laptop sleeve with magnetic closure 12" W x 13" H; fits most 16" laptops
- 2 large slip pockets
- 1 large zip pocket

entry.title: The Mini Work Tote in Cognac Croc
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type:
Price: 108.00

Description

Remember when you said The Work Tote was too big, well enter it's mini-me. The Mini Work Tote is just like this original in a more compact silhouette, it's like a tiny house, if a house could be an on-the-go mobile office in a tote bag! We designed the original because there was not one good-looking bag on the market that we felt just as good carrying to work, to after work cocktails and to all of our out-of-office adventures. This version was designed for you, by you! This chic tote packs in ALL the function, no detail was left out!
Specifications

Dims: 14.25" W x 11"H x 6"D Materials: Body - Faux Croc PU Lining - Polyester

Laptop Sleeve: 12.5"W x 9"H

Strap - Polyester Care: Spot Clean
Details

EXTERIOR
Flat shoulder straps & removable, adjustable poly shoulder strap
Full zip closure
Trolley pass through with zipper, to create pocket when not in use and extra zip pocket on top
1 exterior slip pocket, 1 exterior zip pocket

INTERIOR
Removable interior zip pouch
Padded laptop sleeve pocket with Velcro strap closure (12.5"W x 9"H)
Large zip pocket
Two small slip pockets & pen slips
Key-ring leash with dog clip to attach keys for quick access

PERFECT FOR
Everyday
Work Days
Weekends
Carry-On

entry.title: The Everyday Tote in Beige
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type:
Price: 108.00

Description

Multifunction at it's very best. Meticulously designed to tackle your everyday, travel, weekend getaways and more. This tote was packed with an enormous amount of function, including 3 different carrying straps and a snap-in pouch that can turn into a shoulder or cross-body bag in a pinch! Our signature padded laptop sleeve, key clip and trolley pass-through that doubles as a pocket, round out this masterpiece!
Shay's Inspo

"It’s true that I love all my babies equally, and this little number is no exception! This bag is almost like a medley of some of our existing hero products, and is so versatile I can’t stand it. Use it for travel, use it for work, use it for meetings but THEN, slip the chain through, pull out the organizational insert and you’ve got yourself a beautiful little purse for a quick exit. Everyday Tote - I love you everyday." -Shay
Details

SO MANY STRAPS!
Multiple ways to carry
REMOVABLE POUCH
Converts into a shoulder bag!
KEY FOB
Because: keys.
EXTERNAL POCKET
Keep small items at-hand
PADDED LAPTOP SLEEVE
Fits up to 16” laptop
TROLLEY PASSTHROUGH
Plays nice with roller bags.
ELASTIC WATER BOTTLE POCKET
Stay hydrated, with wine or water, no one is judging
DIMENSIONS
17.5"W x 16"H x 6"L

entry.title: The Convertible Weekender in Black
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type: the convertible weekender
Price: 118.00

Description

Taking inspiration from our OG weekender, we designed this brand new convertible weekender to take you even further! Features a fully removable bottom compartment that doubles as a packing cube, with a mesh zip-cover. Voila! Now your weekender becomes a compact daytime excursion bag. Wait, not done yet - also includes a removable padded laptop sleeve with exterior pockets, to save you from that awkward moment when you hold up the security line. Easy-access opening makes getting everything in and out a breeze (no flashlight required). Hello, versatility!
Specifications

Dims: 19"W x 10"D x 16"H
Material: Body - Cotton/Polyester, Trim - PVC, Strap - Polyester, Lining - Polyester
Care: Spot Clean
Weight : 3.86lbs  
Details

EXTERIOR
-Rolled shoulder straps for easy carry, adjustable-removable shoulder/crossbody strap
-Wire frame double zip opening/closure, opens wide to see inside
-Double zip removable bottom compartment with water resistant lining
-Trolley pass through with zipper, to create pocket when not in use
-External zip pocket for small items
INTERIOR
-Padded laptop sleeve pocket with Velcro strap closure
-Large zip pocket and two small slip pockets
-Lined with durable, easy to wipe clean, polyester, water-resistant lining
Key-ring strap with dog clip to attach keys for quick access
PERFECT FOR
-Long Weekends
-Carry-On Status
-Day Trips
-Baby Bag
-Work Bag
-Gym Bag
-Everyday Bag
-Pet Bag

entry.title: The Diaper Bag in Black
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type: Diaper Bag
Price: 168.00

Description

The anti-diaper diaper bag, a shoulder bag with plenty of room and function to tote around all your baby-mama essentials and chic enough that NO ONE will ever suspect you're carrying around a week old dirty diaper! Complete with every essential needed for that dreaded diaper change; changing pad with a zippered pocket for an extra diaper and baby wipes, an odor-proof pouch, a teething ring to keep the baby from squirming and a pacifier pouch to easily reach that must have plug! And there's MORE! This baby comes with 4 different sets of interchangeable straps; stroller straps, an adjustable shoulder strap, 2 flat shoulder straps and chain straps for when you're feeling fancy! Still not sold? Take this stylish diaper bag for a spin, literally - just click here.

Specifications

Dims: L: 19" W: 7" H: 14"
Materials: Nylon Twill, Poly lining, Water resistant protective finish, Brushed, Gold Hardware, Vegan Buffalo Leather Trim
Care: Spot Clean, Dry Flat
Weight: 4lbs
Details

EXTERIOR
- 5 Exterior pockets(2 slips, 2 slips with magnetic closure, 1 zip) (one pocket to hold changing pad
- trolley sleeve with option to use as zip pocket
- Removable/Interchangeable padded shoulder strap
- Removable/Interchangeable padded chain strap
- Removable/Interchangeable adjustable strap with shoulder pad
- Breakaway zipper for easy access to interior
- snaps on sides to reduce/expand size
- Metal feet on bottom to protect from wear & tear
INTERIOR
- Removable stroller straps
- Tabs for stroller caddy (sold separately)
- Key Fob
- pacifier pouch included
- Odor Proof bag (for dirty diapers/clothing)
- Portable changing pad with slip pocket for diapers & wipes
- Teething ring
- Insulated drawstring pocket for bottles
- padded Laptop sleeve with magnetic closure
- 2 large slip pockets
- 1 large zip pocket
PERFECT FOR
-Baby Needs
-Travel
-Work Tote
-Carry-on
